description: At the flower show, PM @narendramodi unveiled three new Orchid varieties developed in Sikkim. pic.twitter.com/lmPLfLtFsI — PMO India (@PMOIndia) January 18, 2016 PM named two Orchid varieties developed in Sikkim Cymbidium Sardar & Lycaste Deendayal. Sikkim CM named the 3rd one Cymbidium Namo. — PMO…
caption: narendramodi.in
message: Emphasised on organic farming, soil health card, other agriculture initiatives  & Swachh Bharat at meeting of state agriculture ministers. Talked at length about PM Fasal Bima Yojana & how it will give a security cover to our farmers. http://nm-4.com/7bzc
